Question: Squad Mobility CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Squad Mobility

Solar Buggy at CES 2024

- The Solar Buggy is a compact and affordable solar car that charges itself on direct solar energy through an integrated solar panel on the roof.
- It will be available in the US in 2025 starting at $6250 (excl. tax) and can already be pre-ordered.
- The vehicle’s solar panel charges up to 22 km/13,6 mi extra range on sunny days in the Netherlands and up to 31 km/19,2 mi in Las Vegas.
- The four swappable and portable batteries provide a range of 100 km/62 mi excluding solar.
- Squad Mobility has developed a Distributed Microfactory concept in which the Solar Buggy will be assembled in factories worldwide, in local markets close to customers.
- The company is actively scouting manufacturing and distribution partners worldwide including the US.
Summary_cn:
Squad Mobility

2024CES上的太阳能越野车

- 太阳能越野车是一款紧凑且价格实惠的太阳能汽车，通过车顶上的太阳能板直接使用太阳能进行充电。
- 该车将于2025年在美国上市，起售价为6250美元（不含税），现已接受预订。
- 该车的太阳能板在荷兰的晴天可额外充电22公里/13.6英里的续航里程，在拉斯维加斯可达到31公里/19.2英里的续航里程。
- 四个可更换且便携的电池单元提供100公里/62英里的行驶里程（不包括太阳能）。
- Squad Mobility公司研发了分布式微工厂概念，太阳能越野车将在世界各地的工厂进行组装，靠近客户所在的本地市场。
- 该公司正在积极寻找全球制造和分销合作伙伴，包括美国。
